HMO.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: health maintenance organization; a form of health insurance in the US where the person who is insured can use particular doctors, hospitals etc that are taking part in the arrangement
HMO.translation[0].definitions[0].exampl: The health center serves 63,000 HMO members and 8,000 Medicare beneficiaries.
HMO premiums have increased significantly in recent years.
